      • setConcreteTaintCreationRuleOn

        public void setConcreteTaintCreationRuleOn(boolean concreteTaintCreationRuleOn)
        Sets the concrete taint creation rule on. The sub rules are all enabled if concreteTaintCreationRuleOn is true, otherwise they are all disabled. ConcreteTaintCreationRule.
        Parameters:
        concreteTaintCreationRuleOn - the new concrete taint creation rule on
